name: QuadLogix Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
tagline: Mobile Apps & Custom Software Development company
description: We are a software development company with expertise in delivering enterprise grade solutions in the 'Digital' space. We specialize in mobile apps, custom software applications, cloud migration, BI & Analytics solutions. Through our offices in London, Dubai & India we have delivered bespoke Digital solutions to industries such as Banking, Healthcare, Media, Travel, Logistics and Retail.
